00042 ObjectiveFunction* PMeanPTemplate::clone() const
00043   { return new PMeanPTemplate(*this); }
00044   
00045 void PMeanPTemplate::clear()
00046 {
00047   mCount = 0;
00048   mPowSum = 0;
00049   saveCount = 0;
00050   savePowSum = 0;
00051 }
00052 
00053 double PMeanPTemplate::get_value( double power_sum, 
00054                               size_t count, 
00055                               EvalType type,
00056                               size_t& global_count )
00057 {
00058   double result = 0;
00059   switch (type) 
00060   {
00061     case CALCULATE:
00062       result = power_sum;
00063       global_count = count;
00064       break;
00065     
00066     case ACCUMULATE:
00067       mPowSum += power_sum;
00068       mCount += count;
00069       result = mPowSum;
00070       global_count = mCount;
00071       break;
00072     
00073     case SAVE:
00074       savePowSum = power_sum;
00075       saveCount = count;
00076       result = mPowSum;
00077       global_count = mCount;
00078       break;
00079     
00080     case UPDATE:
00081       mPowSum -= savePowSum;
00082       mCount -= saveCount;
00083       savePowSum = power_sum;
00084       saveCount = count;
00085       mPowSum += savePowSum;
00086       mCount += saveCount;
00087       result = mPowSum;
00088       global_count = mCount;
00089       break;
00090     
00091     case TEMPORARY:
00092       result = mPowSum - savePowSum + power_sum;
00093       global_count = mCount + count - saveCount;
00094       break;
00095   }
00096   
00097   return global_count ? result/global_count : 0.0;
00098 }
00099 
00100 bool PMeanPTemplate::evaluate( EvalType type, 
00101                            PatchData& pd,
00102                            double& value_out,
00103                            bool free,
00104                            MsqError& err )
00105 {
00106   QualityMetric* qm = get_quality_metric();
00107   if (type == ObjectiveFunction::ACCUMULATE)
00108     qm->get_single_pass( pd, qmHandles, free, err );
00109   else
00110     qm->get_evaluations( pd, qmHandles, free, err );  
00111   MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00112   
00113     // calculate OF value for just the patch
00114   std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator i;
00115   double value, working_sum = 0.0;
00116   for (i = qmHandles.begin(); i != qmHandles.end(); ++i)
00117   {
00118     bool result = qm->evaluate( pd, *i, value, err );
00119     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !result)
00120       return false;
00121     
00122     working_sum += mPower.raise( value );
00123   }
00124   
00125     // get overall OF value, update member data, etc.
00126   size_t global_count;
00127   value_out = qm->get_negate_flag() 
00128             * get_value( working_sum, qmHandles.size(), type, global_count );
00129   return true;
00130 }
00131 
00132 bool PMeanPTemplate::evaluate_with_gradient( EvalType type, 
00133                                          PatchData& pd,
00134                                          double& value_out,
00135                                          std::vector<Vector3D>& grad_out,
00136                                          MsqError& err )
00137 {
00138   QualityMetric* qm = get_quality_metric();
00139   qm->get_evaluations( pd, qmHandles, OF_FREE_EVALS_ONLY, err );  MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00140   
00141     // zero gradient
00142   grad_out.clear();
00143   grad_out.resize( pd.num_free_vertices(), Vector3D(0.0,0.0,0.0) );
00144   
00145     // calculate OF value and gradient for just the patch
00146   std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator i;
00147   double value, working_sum = 0.0;
00148   const double f = qm->get_negate_flag() * mPower.value();
00149   for (i = qmHandles.begin(); i != qmHandles.end(); ++i)
00150   {
00151     bool result = qm->evaluate_with_gradient( pd, *i, value, mIndices, mGradient, err );
00152     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !result)
00153       return false;
00154     if (fabs(value) < DBL_EPSILON)
00155       continue;
00156     
00157     const double r1 = mPowerMinus1.raise( value );
00158     const double qmp = r1 * value;
00159     working_sum += qmp;
00160     value = f * r1;
00161 
00162     for (size_t j = 0; j < mIndices.size(); ++j) {
00163       mGradient[j] *= value;
00164       grad_out[mIndices[j]] += mGradient[j];
00165     }
00166   }
00167   
00168     // get overall OF value, update member data, etc.
00169   size_t global_count;
00170   value_out = qm->get_negate_flag() 
00171             * get_value( working_sum, qmHandles.size(), type, global_count );
00172   const double inv_n = 1.0 / global_count;
00173   std::vector<Vector3D>::iterator g;
00174   for (g = grad_out.begin(); g != grad_out.end(); ++g)
00175     *g *= inv_n;
00176   return true;
00177 }
00178 
00179 bool PMeanPTemplate::evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( EvalType type, 
00180                                         PatchData& pd,
00181                                         double& value_out,
00182                                         std::vector<Vector3D>& grad_out,
00183                                         std::vector<SymMatrix3D>& hess_diag_out,
00184                                         MsqError& err )
00185 {
00186   QualityMetric* qm = get_quality_metric();
00187   qm->get_evaluations( pd, qmHandles, OF_FREE_EVALS_ONLY, err );  MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00188   
00189     // zero gradient and hessian
00190   const size_t s = pd.num_free_vertices();
00191   grad_out.clear();
00192   grad_out.resize( s, 0.0 );
00193   hess_diag_out.clear();
00194   hess_diag_out.resize( s, 0.0 );
00195   
00196     // calculate OF value and gradient for just the patch
00197   std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator i;
00198   size_t j;
00199   double value, working_sum = 0.0;
00200   const double f1 = qm->get_negate_flag() * mPower.value();
00201   const double f2 = f1 * (mPower.value() - 1);
00202   for (i = qmHandles.begin(); i != qmHandles.end(); ++i)
00203   {
00204     bool result = qm->evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( pd, *i, value, mIndices, mGradient, mDiag, err );
00205     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !result)
00206       return false;
00207     if (fabs(value) < DBL_EPSILON)
00208       continue;
00209     
00210     const size_t nfree = mIndices.size();
00211     if (mPower.value() == 1.0) {
00212       working_sum += mPower.raise( value );
00213       for (j = 0; j < nfree; ++j) {
00214         const size_t idx = mIndices[j];
00215         hess_diag_out[idx] += f1 * mDiag[j];
00216         mGradient[j] *= f1;
00217         grad_out[idx] += mGradient[j];
00218       }
00219     }
00220     else {
00221       const double r2 = mPowerMinus2.raise( value );
00222       const double r1 = r2 * value;
00223       working_sum += r1 * value;
00224       const double hf = f2 * r2;
00225       const double gf = f1 * r1;
00226       for (j = 0; j < nfree; ++j) {
00227         const size_t idx = mIndices[j];
00228 
00229         hess_diag_out[idx] += hf * outer( mGradient[j] );
00230         hess_diag_out[idx] += gf * mDiag[j];
00231 
00232         mGradient[j] *= gf;
00233         grad_out[idx] += mGradient[j];
00234       }
00235     }
00236   }
00237   
00238     // get overall OF value, update member data, etc.
00239   size_t global_count;
00240   value_out = qm->get_negate_flag() 
00241             * get_value( working_sum, qmHandles.size(), type, global_count );
00242   const double inv_n = 1.0 / global_count;
00243   for (j = 0; j < s; ++j) {
00244     grad_out[j] *= inv_n;
00245     hess_diag_out[j] *= inv_n;
00246   }
00247   return true;
00248 }
00249 
00250 bool PMeanPTemplate::evaluate_with_Hessian( EvalType type, 
00251                                         PatchData& pd,
00252                                         double& value_out,
00253                                         std::vector<Vector3D>& grad_out,
00254                                         MsqHessian& Hessian_out,
00255                                         MsqError& err )
00256 {
00257   QualityMetric* qm = get_quality_metric();
00258   qm->get_evaluations( pd, qmHandles, OF_FREE_EVALS_ONLY, err );  MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00259   
00260     // zero gradient and hessian
00261   grad_out.clear();
00262   grad_out.resize( pd.num_free_vertices(), 0.0 );
00263   Hessian_out.zero_out();
00264   
00265     // calculate OF value and gradient for just the patch
00266   std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator i;
00267   size_t j, k, n;
00268   double value, working_sum = 0.0;
00269   const double f1 = qm->get_negate_flag() * mPower.value();
00270   const double f2 = f1 * (mPower.value() - 1);
00271   Matrix3D m;
00272   for (i = qmHandles.begin(); i != qmHandles.end(); ++i)
00273   {
00274     bool result = qm->evaluate_with_Hessian( pd, *i, value, mIndices, mGradient, mHessian, err );
00275     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !result)
00276       return false;
00277     if (fabs(value) < DBL_EPSILON)
00278       continue;
00279     
00280     const size_t nfree = mIndices.size();
00281     n = 0;
00282     if (mPower.value() == 1.0) {
00283       working_sum += mPower.raise( value );
00284       for (j = 0; j < nfree; ++j) {
00285         mGradient[j] *= f1;
00286         grad_out[mIndices[j]] += mGradient[j];
00287         for (k = j; k < nfree; ++k) {
00288           mHessian[n] *= f1;
00289           Hessian_out.add( mIndices[j], mIndices[k], mHessian[n], err );  MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00290           ++n;
00291         }
00292      }
00293     }
00294     else {
00295       const double r2 = mPowerMinus2.raise( value );
00296       const double r1 = r2 * value;
00297       working_sum += r1 * value;
00298       const double hf = f2 * r2;
00299       const double gf = f1 * r1;
00300       for (j = 0; j < nfree; ++j) {
00301         for (k = j; k < nfree; ++k) {
00302           m.outer_product( mGradient[j], mGradient[k] );
00303           m *= hf;
00304           mHessian[n] *= gf;
00305           m += mHessian[n];
00306           Hessian_out.add( mIndices[j], mIndices[k], m, err );  MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00307           ++n;
00308         }
00309       }
00310       for (j = 0; j < nfree; ++j) {
00311         mGradient[j] *= gf;
00312         grad_out[mIndices[j]] += mGradient[j];
00313       }
00314     }
00315   }
00316   
00317     // get overall OF value, update member data, etc.
00318   size_t global_count;
00319   value_out = qm->get_negate_flag() 
00320             * get_value( working_sum, qmHandles.size(), type, global_count );
00321   const double inv_n = 1.0 / global_count;
00322   std::vector<Vector3D>::iterator g;
00323   for (g = grad_out.begin(); g != grad_out.end(); ++g)
00324     *g *= inv_n;
00325   Hessian_out.scale( inv_n );
00326   return true;
00327 }
